isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - IC BUS - FENDER MOUNTED MIRRORS - Fender Mounting Installation

note.para: An assistant may be required to assist in mounting the fender mounted rear view mirrors.

step1.para: Release hood latches on each side of hood and tilt to a 45 degree angle.
Beginning on the driver side fender, install the 10-32 x 1 1/4" SST CRPNH screw and 10-32 HXHD SS (Items 1 and 6, Figure 28) nylok attaching the angle brace to the hood assembly.
Install the 10-32 x 1 1/4" SST GRPNH screw (Items 1 and 4, Figure 28) to the threaded insert, and attach the forward hood attachment brace.

An assistant is required to hold mirror assembly while being installed. Align the mounting base with the holes in the fender section. Insert the 4, 10-32 x 1 1/4" SST CRPNH screws and 10-32 HXHD SS nyloks (Items 1 and 3, Figure 28) and tighten.

If the mirrors are equipped with heaters, feed wire through the grommet (Item 2, detail "A", Figure 29) located behind the mounting base. Insert the wire pin connector into the connector plug. Plug the connector into the chassis pigtail.
Follow the same procedure to install passenger side mirror assembly.
